ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class CachingClient.CachingClientWrapperSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.CachingClient.CachingClientWrapperSearcher
  • Enclosing class:
    CachingClient<TClient extends ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RemoteClient>

    public class CachingClient.CachingClientWrapperSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    CachingClientWrapperSearcher Is a Searcher that that wraps a RemoteClient Searcher
    See Also:
    Searcher
